column3: Fixed all the tests now. @mrbandrews might want to review the changes to fullblocktest...I dont think I broke anything, but would be good to get some review there.\n
NACK for now as I see the additional block propagation speed as more important - or I am falsely assuming this will decrease block propagation times?\n

@rebroad this will not change propagation speeds between reasonably up-to-date nodes, and fixes several issues.

@mrbandrews found some issues with the tests...will get this rebased once they are fixed.
Rebased and replaced my broken test update with one from @mrbandrews.\n
